title: Verizon to report earnings October 21, 2022
text: NEW YORK, Oct. 20, 2022 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE, Nasdaq: VZ) will report third-quarter 2022 earnings on Friday, October 21.

title: Verizon Q3 Preview: Rebound Quarter Inbound?
text: The company fell short of earnings expectations by roughly 2% in its latest print.

title: Telecom Earnings Preview: Can AT&T and Verizon Stocks Rebound?
text: Positive third quarter earnings reports and strong guidance could give a much needed boost to the nation's two largest wireless service providers. Both AT&T and Verizon trade at a discount relative to their past and offer high dividend yields to reward patient investors.

title: Verizon Alerts Prepaid Customers to Recent Security Breach
text: An undisclosed number of Verizon prepaid accounts were compromised.

title: What The Market Gets Wrong About Verizon - A Contrarian View
text: Verizon is hit by two major headwinds, ongoing macro headwinds and the (related) inability to maintain its expected rate of growth. Its stock price is getting pressured as investors have lost patience, pushing the valuation toward a 10-year low.
